comment: The binomial theorem for linear polynomials (monic polynomials of degree 1) over commutative rings, expressed by an element of this ring: ` ( X + A ) ^ N ` is the sum from ` k = 0 ` to ` N ` of ` ( N _C k ) x. ( ( A ^ ( N - k ) ) x. ( X ^ k ) ) ` . (Contributed by AV, 25-Aug-2019.)
